name: Alpinist: Highest Ground
description:
My first game. Made with the collaboration of Oliver Schlampp in less than 72 hours for the Mini Jam 52. This Jam had the theme of "Summit" and the limitation of input to just WASD and the arrow keys.

We plan to add further content to the game in the near future as a "Post-Jam" version of the game! So be sure to leave suggestions.

It is still in a pretty early state and there are some bugs, please report any if you see one!

Hope, you'll enjoy it ^^

Controls:

WASD Movement

Objective:

Reach the summit
